description.brazilian: Defenda a vila da invasão dos mascarados
description.english: Defend the village from the masked invasion
description.german: Verteidige das Dorf vor der maskierten Invasion
description.russian: Защитите деревню от нашествия в масках
description.schinese: 保卫村庄免遭假面入侵
description.spanish: Defiende la aldea de la invasión de los enmascarados

description.brazilian: Defenda a vila da segunda invasão dos mascarados
description.english: Defend the village from the second masked invasion

description.spanish: Defiende la aldea de la segunda invasión de los enmascarados

description.brazilian: Destrua os cemitérios perto da vila
description.english: Destroy the cemeteries near the village
description.german: Zerstöre die Friedhöfe in der Nähe des Dorfes
description.spanish: Destruye los cementerios cerca de la aldea

description.brazilian: Defenda a vila da invasão dos Orcs

description.spanish: Salva a un náufrago de las aguas traicioneras
